Auto tracking is disabled. Can be modified in settings.
Would you like to enable automatic tracking? You can later change this in settings.
Would you like to automatically tracking? Tracking requires location permission. You can later change this in settings.
Automatic tracking may be unreliable while battery optimalizations are enabled. Disabling them should have low impact on your battery life. Tracking itself is unaffected by battery optimalizations.
Would you like to enabled automatic uploading of tracked data on wifi?\nYou can later change this in settings.
Signals can take care of tracking and uploading automatically for you if you enable it.
Signals uses Google Signin to identify uploads, track challenge progress, generate personal stats and more. You will not be able to upload data until you sign in.
Signals prepares few challenges every week for you to complete. Every challenge awards additional wireless points based on its difficulty.
